headline: Is Fortinet (FTNT) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness And DCF Upside Estimate
summary: If you are wondering whether Fortinet's current share price offers good value or not, it helps to step back and separate the security story from what you are actually paying for the stock. Fortinet closed at US$80.02, with returns of 0.8% over 7 days, a 4.2% decline over 30 days, a 2.7% gain year to date, and a 16.7% decline over 1 year. This gives you a mix of recent weakness and longer term gains of 64.0% over 3 years and 170.5% over 5 years. Recent attention around large cybersecurity...

headline: Assessing Fortinet (FTNT) Valuation After Mixed Returns And A Highlighted Profitability Narrative
summary: Fortinet (FTNT) has come under closer investor scrutiny after recent share price moves, with the stock showing mixed performance, including a one-month decline and a three-month drop alongside a positive three-year total return. See our latest analysis for Fortinet. Fortinet’s recent 1-day share price return of 2.01% to $80.02 comes after a 30-day share price decline of 4.20% and a 1-year total shareholder return of 16.68% in the red, despite a strong 63.98% total shareholder return over...
